channel.title: Quick Question about Commands
channel.description:
Hello I am new and I plan to be an active member at the MoparScape forums (both of them). Anyway, I have my client.java script in text form on my screen at the moment and I can't seem to find the section were it lists out the commands, and their usage rights. Could someone please post something I could search for in the client.java file to locate the list of commands programmed into my server.
Oh and by the way, I would like also ask another thing, How do you create a Private Server CLIENT. Not and actual server, I can do that. But a client like the MoparScape Client and such. Maybe a link to some information or something like that.
Thx!
-Zeecron

item.title: Quick Question about Commands
item.dc:creator: @ZeecronNetwork ZeecronNetwork
item.description:
@ZeecronNetwork wrote:

client.java:10196: ‘else’ without ‘if’
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“admintown”) && playerRights >= 2)
